title: Bug 46471Compiled tag files from different tag libraries share the same package
description: When in web application there are several tag libraries packed in jar files that have tag files in them, when those files are compiled they share the same package:org.apache.jsp.tag.metaAs a result, if there are tags with the same name in different libraries, only one of them survives.I encountered it while investigating bug 37084. See comment 13 there.
